org.arl.fjage.rmi

Interface RemoteContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MasterContainer, RemoteContainerProxy, SlaveContainer

    public interface RemoteContainer
extends java.rmi.Remote
    RMI interface for remote containers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AgentID agentForService(java.lang.String service)
      Finds an agent providing a named service.
      AgentID[] agentsForService(java.lang.String service)
      Finds all agents providing a named service.

      Attaches a slave container to the master container.
      boolean containsAgent(AgentID aid)
      Checks if an agent exists in the container.

      Deregisters an agent as a provider of all services.

      Deregisters an agent as a provider of a specific service.

      Detaches a slave container from the master container.

      Gets the remote access URL of the container.

      Sends a message.
      void shutdown()
      Terminates the container and all agents in it.

    • Method Detail

      • getURL

        java.lang.String getURL()
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets the remote access URL of the container.
        Returns:
        the URL of the container.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • attachSlave

        boolean attachSlave(java.lang.String url)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Attaches a slave container to the master container. Implemented only by master containers.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of the slave container.
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • detachSlave

        boolean detachSlave(java.lang.String url)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Detaches a slave container from the master container. Implemented only by master containers.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of the slave container.
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • containsAgent

        boolean containsAgent(AgentID aid)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Checks if an agent exists in the container.
        Parameters:
        aid - agent id to check.
        Returns:
        true if the agent exists, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • register

        boolean register(AgentID aid,
               java.lang.String service)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Registers an agent in the directory service as a provider of a named service.
        Parameters:
        aid - id of agent providing the service.
        service - name of the service.
        Returns:
        true on success, false on failure.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • deregister

        boolean deregister(AgentID aid,
                 java.lang.String service)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Deregisters an agent as a provider of a specific service.
        Parameters:
        aid - id of agent to deregister.
        service - name of the service to deregister.
        Returns:
        true on success, false on failure.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • deregister

        void deregister(AgentID aid)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Deregisters an agent as a provider of all services.
        Parameters:
        aid - id of agent to deregister.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • agentForService

        AgentID agentForService(java.lang.String service)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Finds an agent providing a named service.
        Parameters:
        service - name of the service.
        Returns:
        agent id for service provider, null if none found.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • agentsForService

        AgentID[] agentsForService(java.lang.String service)
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Finds all agents providing a named service.
        Parameters:
        service - name of the service.
        Returns:
        an array of agent ids for service providers, null if none found.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • send

        boolean send(Message m,
           boolean relay)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sends a message. The message is sent to the recipient specified in the message.
        Parameters:
        m - message to deliver
        relay - enable relaying to associated remote containers.
        Returns:
        true if delivered, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Terminates the container and all agents in it.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
